de.undercouch.citeproc.mendeley

Interface MendeleyConnector

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AuthenticatedMendeleyConnector, DefaultMendeleyConnector, MendeleyConnectorAdapter

    public interface MendeleyConnector
    Reads documents from the Mendeley REST services. Needs an OAuth API key and secret in order to authenticate. Users of this class should register their app to receive such a key and secret.
    Author:
    Michel Kraemer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void authorize(String verificationCode)
      Authorizes the app.
      String getAccessTokenSecret() 
      String getAccessTokenValue()

    • Method Detail

      • getAuthorizationURL

        String getAuthorizationURL()
                           throws IOException
        Gets a new authorization URL from the Mendeley server. This is the first step in the OAuth authorization process. The user has to visit the authorization URL and grant access to this app. Then they will get an verification code which has to be passed to authorize(String)
        Returns:
        the URL the authorization URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if the authorization URL could not be retrieved

      • authorize

        void authorize(String verificationCode)
               throws IOException
        Authorizes the app. This is the third step in the OAuth authorization process. After the user has visited the authorization URL that was generated by getAuthorizationURL(), this method has to be called to finish authorization
        Parameters:
        verificationCode - the verification code the user received from the authorization URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if authorization failed

      • setAccessToken

        void setAccessToken(String token,
                  String secret)

        Authorizes the app. If you already know a valid OAuth access token (for example if you cached it from previous sessions) you may call this method instead of getAuthorizationURL() and authorize(String).

        This method just saves the provided access token. It does not act with the Mendeley REST services in any way.

        Parameters:
        token - the access token value
        secret - the access token's secret
        See Also:
        getAccessTokenValue(), getAccessTokenSecret()

      • getAccessTokenValue

        String getAccessTokenValue()
        Returns:
        the access token's value used for authentication or null if the app is not yet authenticated
        See Also:
        setAccessToken(String, String)

      • getAccessTokenSecret

        String getAccessTokenSecret()
        Returns:
        the access token's secret used for authentication or null if the app is not yet authenticated
        See Also:
        setAccessToken(String, String)

      • getDocuments

        List<String> getDocuments()
                          throws IOException
        Requests a list of document IDs from the server. The user has to be authenticated before this method can be called.
        Returns:
        the document IDs
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedException - if the user is not authenticated
        RequestException - if the server returns an error code
        IOException - if the documents could not be read from the server

      • getDocument

        CSLItemData getDocument(String documentId)
                        throws IOException
        Requests a document from the service. The user has to be authenticated before this method can be called.
        Parameters:
        documentId - the document's ID
        Returns:
        the document
        Throws:
        UnauthorizedException - if the user is not authenticated
        RequestException - if the server returns an error code
        IOException - if the document could not be read from the server
